ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cnsubglem.1 | |- ( x e. A -> x e. CC ) |

| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_cnsubrglem | |- A e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) |
